revised_title: Industrial and Academic Collaboration in New Technology Development
tldr: This article discusses the importance of collaboration between industry and academia in the development of new technology. It presents five case studies in biotechnology, polymer technology, and information technology, highlighting the benefits of close collaboration between industrial and academic scientists and engineers. The author emphasizes the critical role of key individuals and the need for a clear understanding of the science base to ensure successful collaboration.
